TaskDescription: Click button NewWorkpeace to add a new workpiece to the scene. As you can see it covers the photocell. To complete the test, also turn on the motor for compres via SwitchCompressor and wait for 3 seconds to build up the preasure

ChatBubbles.Text: This is the button to add new workpiece. You can also press X on the keyboard.
This is the SwitchCompressor. Program it to turn on themotor for compressor.
If the  the preasure level bar is empty, pistons won't move.
